__e: His name is Alfred, and, yes, he does.
Maybe we should just call Larry and tell him you're not feeling up to it.
We aren't really ready for you, Mr Alfred... What with the mister and missis away.
- I want that lawyer, Alfred or whatever
Larry, I know how badly you want his account, and I'll be there, but I'm not sure whether Sam can make it.
I mean, you're just, like, uh, older, you know?
Remember how little Alfred finally got what he wanted for Christmas?
I won't forget what Alfred did to me in the name of his God!
And just days ago, Alfred has sent his very own priest.
Alfred, would you take me home, please?
Larry, you expect me to believe that?
Now, Alfred, you can buy me that drink.
